articles.content: The pixel painting sitting before us comes to portray a melange involving elements from both rear-engined, all-wheel-drive Zuffenhausen machines - yes, the Turbo can thank the 959 for its all-paw form.Speaking of which, we can be grateful to the evolutionary … [+1183 chars]

articles.author: Harry Pettit
articles.title: Samsung accidentally leaks image of new Galaxy Note 20 smartphone – before deleting it from website - The Sun
articles.content:
SAMSUNG appears to have accidentally leaked an image of its latest smartphone online.
The South Korean tech titan posted an picture to its website on Monday that included what looked like the Samsung Galaxy Note 20.
 An image of what appears to be a new Gal… [+2538 chars]
